PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-14322017-11-23,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC,  PSC
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectRegulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the Public Service Employment Act
PrecisRegulations Amending and Repealing CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PUBLIC SERVICE EMPLOYMENT ACT in order to (1) update the Statistic Canada Regulations and the Alternates Regulations by adding the statutory priority entitlement of Canadian Forces members to the list of exclusions; (2) delete the word “household” in reference to the national survey, when the survey is conducted for the purposes of the census; and (3) repeal the obsolete Census regulations
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0252 Publication Date: 2017-12-13
AttachmentsAttachment
